original_text: This service that you perform is not only supplying the needs of the Lord’s people but is also overflowing in many expressions of thanks to God.
korean_text: 이 봉사의 직무가 성도들의 부족한 것을 보충할 뿐 아니라 사람들이 하나님께 드리는 많은 감사로 말미암아 넘쳤느니라

sentences.original_text: is not only supplying the needs of the Lord's people
sentences.korean_translation: 주님의 백성의 필요를 채워줄 뿐만 아니라

sentences.original_text: in many expressions of thanks to God
